import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from "../Context" const Publicaciones = () => { const{tienda, setTienda} = useContext (Context); const filteredData = tienda.filter((e) => e.idUs === 1); //setTienda(filteredData) return ( <>
{filteredData.map((elem) =>(
{elem.name}
${(elem.price).toLocaleString("es-Cl")}
deleteFavorito (elem.id)}>
))}
) } export default Publicaciones
